alert.note: Alert for Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 10:39AM CDT until April 19 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red Lake River at Crookston. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, EOC Committee meets to determine when to open EOC. Decision based on river level predictions and forecasted weather. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning to a crest of 17.1 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
